definitions.definition: The cubical part of a pedestal ; a plinth .
A device for cutting into a specified shape .
A device used to cut an external screw thread . (Internal screw threads are cut with a tap .)
A mold for forming metal or plastic objects.
An embossed device used in stamping coins and medals .
( semiconductors , plural also dice ) An oblong chip fractured from a semiconductor wafer engineered to perform as an independent device or integrated circuit .
Any small cubical or square body.

main_definition: The cubical part of a pedestal ; a plinth .
secondary_definitions: A device for cutting into a specified shape .
A device used to cut an external screw thread . (Internal screw threads are cut with a tap .)
A mold for forming metal or plastic objects.
An embossed device used in stamping coins and medals .
( semiconductors , plural also dice ) An oblong chip fractured from a semiconductor wafer engineered to perform as an independent device or integrated circuit .
Any small cubical or square body.

definitions.definition: An isohedral polyhedron , usually a cube , with numbers or symbols on each side and thrown in games of chance .
examples: I rolled the die and moved 2 spaces on the board.

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) That which is, or might be, determined, by a throw of the die; hazard ; chance .

main_definition: An isohedral polyhedron , usually a cube , with numbers or symbols on each side and thrown in games of chance .
